H

hash(String) - Static method in class com.github.davidcarboni.cryptolite.Password

useStandardKeys() - Static method in class com.github.davidcarboni.cryptolite.Keys
By default, the JVM will only allow up to 128-bit AES keys ("standard").
useStrongKeys() - Static method in class com.github.davidcarboni.cryptolite.Keys
If the "Java Cryptography Extension (JCE) Unlimited Strength Jurisdiction Policy Files" is correctly installed for your JVM, it's possible to use strong (256-bit) keys.
